title: OPL Split 2 Week 6 results!
body:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/opl_split_1_announce.jpg?itok=aX-Y1qp7

Hey guys,

Another week over with some more intense games. Did anyone catch last nights match between Legacy and Chiefs?

The biggest upset of the week was Sudden Fear vs Immunity with only 10% of players picking Sudden Fear to win!

In saying that out of all the players that participated this week there was only 1 winner. Congratulations to Elysium Mons for picking all 8 correctly and winning 250RP.
